Re: GW'05

2005-05-03

I dreamt I kissed someone in a van last night... the setting was a parking lot somewhere in Iwate... and then there were a couple of guys that showed up and stopped things from going further, but I think they were innocently ignorant of their c-blockage. One guy was called Brian and he had just bought a record label from Phish. We discussed the economics of jam-band fan-bases.

---
Happy GW everybody!

---
A man when he lies down is reduced to 1/9 of his height. - da Vinci
